scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run postgres" "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.precommit: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
scripts.codegen:full: npm run copytypes && curl http://localhost:3000/docs-json > frontend/src/api/swagger.json && cd backend && npx prettier --write ../frontend/src/api/swagger.json && cd ../frontend && npm run codegen
scripts.copytypes:
cd backend/src/types && for f in *; do echo -e '/* Edit this file in backend/src/types */
' > ../../../frontend/src/types/$f && cat $f >> ../../../frontend/src/types/$f; done
